Description: 3 Bed 1 Bath in Malden. Move in 8/15 or 9/1. No Pets. Massive living room - dining room open concept with a very large Sunroom with many large windows. Plenty of light, space and storage 1 Parking spot available for $100. Driveway will be available for roommates during storms. 1000+ sqft. NO LAUNDRY on site, but 2 laundromats very close. Tenants pay for annual trash sticker (LL remembered roughly $75) Walking distance from Malden Center, Malden Station, or Oak Grove station. Right off 93.
